# Imports
from sys import stdin, stdout

# Input
S = stdin.readline().strip()
T = stdin.readline().strip()

# Variables
counter = 0

# Counting
for i in range(len(S)):
    if S[i] != T[i]:
        counter += 1

# Output
stdout.write(str(counter) + '\n')

s = input()
t = input()

cnt = 0
for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] != t[i]:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt)
